com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheap

Class OnHeapMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheap.OffHeapMemory
      • com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheap.OnHeapMemory

  •  class OnHeapMemory
extends OffHeapMemory
    Implementation of OffHeapMemory using byte array effectively making it OnHeap memory
    Author:
    alexkasko Date: 1/14/13
